ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains digitally computed Filter Bank spectra and E12 peak and average in HF band from the Search Coil Magnetometer (SCM) and the Electric Field Instrument (EFI) on board THEMIS-E.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
SCM data, as a data set of the THEMIS data products, are open to all scientists and the public (Users).
Users should contact the THEMIS Principal Investigator (PI) V. Angelopoulos and O. Le Contel the co-investigator (CoI) of the SCM instrument to consult on the appropriate use of instrument data.
Users should acknowledge the sources of data used in all publications, presentations, and reports. Please send information on the use of these data to:
- PI: V. Angelopoulos [vassilis@ucla.edu]
- co-I: O. Le Contel [olivier.lecontel@lpp.polytechnique.fr]
We suggest to add the following lines into the acknowledgments:
The authors acknowledge NASA, CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales), CNRS (Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique) for their support to the THEMIS/SCM team and the CDPP (Centre de Donn√©es de la Physique des Plasmas) for the distribution of the THEMIS/SCM data.
and if PI/coI are not part of the publication list, then we suggest to add Specifically, we acknowledge V. Angelopous for use of data from the THEMIS mission, O. Le Contel and the late A. Roux for use of SCM data. For more informations about data policy and credits, see http://themis.ssl.berkeley.edu/roadrules.shtml
The following papers should also be used to reference:
Roux, A., O. Le Contel, C. Coillot, A. Bouabdellah, B. de la Porte, D. Alison, S. Ruocco, and M.C. Vassal (2008), The search coil magnetometer for THEMIS, Space Sci. Rev., doi: 10.1007/s11214-008-9371-y.
Le Contel, O., A. Roux, P. Robert, C. Coillot, A. Bouabdellah, B. de la Porte, D. Alison, S. Ruocco, V. Angelopoulos, K. Bromund, C.C. Chaston, C. Cully, H.U. Auster, K.H. Glassmeier, W. Baumjohann, C.W. Carlson, J.P. McFadden, and D. Larson (2008), First results of the THEMIS search coil magnetometers, Space Sci. Rev., doi:10.1007/s11214-008-9371-y.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E THE_fbh
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Peak and average values from the coupled, high-frequency signal off opposing EFI booms 1 and 2. Booms 1 and 2 are situated in the spin plane of the spacecraft, boom 1 along the positive x-axis (SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI sensor 1
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK potential, EFI sensor 1 in spacecraft spin plane along the positive x-axis(SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI sensor 2
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK potential, EFI sensor 2 in spacecraft spin plane along the negative x-axis (SPG coordinates)

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI sensor 3
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK potential, EFI sensor 3 in spacecraft spin plane along the positive y-axis (SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI sensor 4
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK potential, EFI sensor 4 in spacecraft spin plane along the negative y-axis (SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI sensor 5
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK potential, EFI sensor 5 located atop spacecraft along the spin axis (positive z-axis) (SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI sensor 6
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK potential, EFI sensor 6 located below the spacecraft along the spin axis (negative z-axis) (SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI DC component sensors 1 and 2
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK coupled E field DC component, EFI sensors 1 and 2 in the spacecraft spin plane (sensor 1 along positive x-axis, SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI DC component sensors 3 and 4
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK coupled E field DC component, EFI sensors 3 and 4 in the spacecraft spin plane (sensor 3 along positive y-axis, SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra EFI DC component sensors 5 and 6
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram FBK coupled E field DC component, EFI sensors 5 and 6 (axial, sensor 5 along positve z-axis, SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectrogram SCM Axis 1
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram for FBK Search Coil Magnetometer (SCM) Axis 1.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectrogram SCM Axis 2
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram for FBK Search Coil Magnetometer (SCM) Axis 2.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectrogram SCM Axis 3
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spectrogram for FBK Search Coil Magnetometer (SCM) Axis 3.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E FBK spectrogram for coupled E field AC component, EFI sensors 1 and 2 (spin plane, sensor 1 along positve x-axis, SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E FBK spectrogram for coupled E field AC component, EFI sensors 3 and 4 (spin plane, sensor 3 along positive y-axis, SPG coordinates).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Calibrated Spectra
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E FBK spectrogram for coupled E field AC component, EFI sensors 5 and 6 (axial, sensor 5 along positive z-axis, SPG coordinates).
